select g.cpagercodi, g.emprcodi, g.equicodi, g.cpagedtipcsv, g.cpagedfecha, SUM(g.cpagedh1) AS cpagedh1, SUM(g.cpagedh2) AS cpagedh2, SUM(g.cpagedh3) AS cpagedh3, SUM(g.cpagedh4) AS cpagedh4, SUM(g.cpagedh5) AS cpagedh5, SUM(g.cpagedh6) AS cpagedh6, SUM(g.cpagedh7) AS cpagedh7, SUM(g.cpagedh8) AS cpagedh8, SUM(g.cpagedh9) AS cpagedh9, SUM(g.cpagedh10) AS cpagedh10, SUM(g.cpagedh11) AS cpagedh11, SUM(g.cpagedh12) AS cpagedh12, SUM(g.cpagedh13) AS cpagedh13, SUM(g.cpagedh14) AS cpagedh14, SUM(g.cpagedh15) AS cpagedh15, SUM(g.cpagedh16) AS cpagedh16, SUM(g.cpagedh17) AS cpagedh17, SUM(g.cpagedh18) AS cpagedh18, SUM(g.cpagedh19) AS cpagedh19, SUM(g.cpagedh20) AS cpagedh20, SUM(g.cpagedh21) AS cpagedh21, SUM(g.cpagedh22) AS cpagedh22, SUM(g.cpagedh23) AS cpagedh23, SUM(g.cpagedh24) AS cpagedh24, SUM(g.cpagedh25) AS cpagedh25, SUM(g.cpagedh26) AS cpagedh26, SUM(g.cpagedh27) AS cpagedh27, SUM(g.cpagedh28) AS cpagedh28, SUM(g.cpagedh29) AS cpagedh29, SUM(g.cpagedh30) AS cpagedh30, SUM(g.cpagedh31) AS cpagedh31, SUM(g.cpagedh32) AS cpagedh32, SUM(g.cpagedh33) AS cpagedh33, SUM(g.cpagedh34) AS cpagedh34, SUM(g.cpagedh35) AS cpagedh35, SUM(g.cpagedh36) AS cpagedh36, SUM(g.cpagedh37) AS cpagedh37, SUM(g.cpagedh38) AS cpagedh38, SUM(g.cpagedh39) AS cpagedh39, SUM(g.cpagedh40) AS cpagedh40, SUM(g.cpagedh41) AS cpagedh41, SUM(g.cpagedh42) AS cpagedh42, SUM(g.cpagedh43) AS cpagedh43, SUM(g.cpagedh44) AS cpagedh44, SUM(g.cpagedh45) AS cpagedh45, SUM(g.cpagedh46) AS cpagedh46, SUM(g.cpagedh47) AS cpagedh47, SUM(g.cpagedh48) AS cpagedh48, SUM(g.cpagedh49) AS cpagedh49, SUM(g.cpagedh50) AS cpagedh50, SUM(g.cpagedh51) AS cpagedh51, SUM(g.cpagedh52) AS cpagedh52, SUM(g.cpagedh53) AS cpagedh53, SUM(g.cpagedh54) AS cpagedh54, SUM(g.cpagedh55) AS cpagedh55, SUM(g.cpagedh56) AS cpagedh56, SUM(g.cpagedh57) AS cpagedh57, SUM(g.cpagedh58) AS cpagedh58, SUM(g.cpagedh59) AS cpagedh59, SUM(g.cpagedh60) AS cpagedh60, SUM(g.cpagedh61) AS cpagedh61, SUM(g.cpagedh62) AS cpagedh62, SUM(g.cpagedh63) AS cpagedh63, SUM(g.cpagedh64) AS cpagedh64, SUM(g.cpagedh65) AS cpagedh65, SUM(g.cpagedh66) AS cpagedh66, SUM(g.cpagedh67) AS cpagedh67, SUM(g.cpagedh68) AS cpagedh68, SUM(g.cpagedh69) AS cpagedh69, SUM(g.cpagedh70) AS cpagedh70, SUM(g.cpagedh71) AS cpagedh71, SUM(g.cpagedh72) AS cpagedh72, SUM(g.cpagedh73) AS cpagedh73, SUM(g.cpagedh74) AS cpagedh74, SUM(g.cpagedh75) AS cpagedh75, SUM(g.cpagedh76) AS cpagedh76, SUM(g.cpagedh77) AS cpagedh77, SUM(g.cpagedh78) AS cpagedh78, SUM(g.cpagedh79) AS cpagedh79, SUM(g.cpagedh80) AS cpagedh80, SUM(g.cpagedh81) AS cpagedh81, SUM(g.cpagedh82) AS cpagedh82, SUM(g.cpagedh83) AS cpagedh83, SUM(g.cpagedh84) AS cpagedh84, SUM(g.cpagedh85) AS cpagedh85, SUM(g.cpagedh86) AS cpagedh86, SUM(g.cpagedh87) AS cpagedh87, SUM(g.cpagedh88) AS cpagedh88, SUM(g.cpagedh89) AS cpagedh89, SUM(g.cpagedh90) AS cpagedh90, SUM(g.cpagedh91) AS cpagedh91, SUM(g.cpagedh92) AS cpagedh92, SUM(g.cpagedh93) AS cpagedh93, SUM(g.cpagedh94) AS cpagedh94, SUM(g.cpagedh95) AS cpagedh95, SUM(g.cpagedh96) AS cpagedh96, e.equinomb, se.emprnomb from cpa_gercsvdet g inner join si_empresa se on g.emprcodi = se.emprcodi inner join eq_equipo e on g.equicodi = e.equicodi where g.cpagercodi = :cpagercodi and g.cpagedtipcsv = :cpagedtipcsv and cpagedfecha between :cpagedfecha and :cpagedfecha GROUP BY g.cpagercodi, g.emprcodi, g.equicodi, g.cpagedtipcsv, g.cpagedfecha, e.equinomb, se.emprnomb order by g.cpagedfecha
